title: Bel Canto (restaurant)
text:
Bel Canto is a <a href="Chain%20store">chain</a> of <a href="restaurant">restaurant</a>s, based in <a href="Paris">Paris</a>, <a href="France">France</a>, where singers perform live <a href="opera">opera</a> <a href="aria">aria</a>s for the diners.
Concept.
Bel Canto employs <a href="opera%20singer">opera singer</a>s as waiters and waitresses. The singers usually work in groups of four, and every 15 minutes a different opera aria is performed. As of 2008, Bel Canto employed 50 singers and 10 pianists. The restaurants are decorated in red and gold velvet, with <a href="musical%20instrument">musical instrument</a>s and opera costumes lining the walls.
History.
The first Bel Canto restaurant opened in Paris in 1999, and since then another restaurant opened in Paris, and a third in <a href="Neuilly-sur-Seine">Neuilly-sur-Seine</a>. After an unsuccessful attempt in La City, <a href="London">London</a>, in 2008, Bel Canto London opened in Corus Grand Hotel Hyde Park in 2009.
